an7.50:1.1: Atha kho janussoni brahmano yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavata saddhim sammodi.
an7.50:1.2: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho janussoni brahmano bhagavantam etadavoca:
an7.50:1.5: ‘akhandam acchiddam asabalam akammasam paripunnam parisuddham brahmacariyam carati’ti, mameva tam, brahmana, samma vadamano vadeyya:
an7.50:1.6: ‘ahanhi, brahmana, akhandam acchiddam asabalam akammasam paripunnam parisuddham brahmacariyam carami’”ti.
an7.50:1.7: “Kim pana, bho gotama, brahmacariyassa khandampi chiddampi sabalampi kammasampi”ti?
an7.50:2.1: “Idha, brahmana, ekacco samano va brahmano va samma brahmacari patijanamano na heva kho matugamena saddhim dvayamdvayasamapattim samapajjati;
an7.50:2.2: api ca kho matugamassa ucchadanaparimaddananhapanasambahanam sadiyati.
an7.50:2.3: So tam assadeti, tam nikameti, tena ca vittim apajjati.
an7.50:2.4: Idampi kho, brahmana, brahmacariyassa khandampi chiddampi sabalampi kammasampi.
an7.50:2.5: Ayam vuccati, brahmana, aparisuddham brahmacariyam carati, samyutto methunena samyogena na parimuccati jatiya jaraya maranena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upayasehi, na parimuccati dukkhasmati vadami.
an7.50:3.1: Puna caparam, brahmana, idhekacco samano va brahmano va samma brahmacari patijanamano na heva kho matugamena saddhim dvayamdvayasamapattim samapajjati, napi matugamassa ucchadanaparimaddananhapanasambahanam sadiyati;
an7.50:3.2: api ca kho matugamena saddhim sanjagghati sankilati sankelayati …pe….
an7.50:4.1: Napi matugamena saddhim sanjagghati sankilati sankelayati;
an7.50:4.2: api ca kho matugamassa cakkhuna cakkhum upanijjhayati pekkhati …pe….
an7.50:5.1: Napi matugamassa cakkhuna cakkhum upanijjhayati pekkhati;
an7.50:5.2: api ca kho matugamassa saddam sunati tirokuttam va tiropakaram va hasantiya va bhanantiya va gayantiya va rodantiya va …pe….
an7.50:6.1: Napi matugamassa saddam sunati tirokuttam va tiropakaram va hasantiya va bhanantiya va gayantiya va rodantiya va;
an7.50:6.2: api ca kho yanissa tani pubbe matugamena saddhim hasitalapitakilitani tani anussarati …pe….
an7.50:7.1: Napi yanissa tani pubbe matugamena saddhim hasitalapitakilitani tani anussarati;
an7.50:7.2: api ca kho passati gahapatim va gahapatiputtam va pancahi kamagunehi samappitam samangibhutam paricarayamanam …pe….
an7.50:8.1: Napi passati gahapatim va gahapatiputtam va pancahi kamagunehi samappitam samangibhutam paricarayamanam;
an7.50:8.2: api ca kho annataram devanikayam panidhaya brahmacariyam carati iminaham silena va vatena va tapena va brahmacariyena va devo va bhavissami devannataro vati.
an7.50:8.3: So tam assadeti, tam nikameti, tena ca vittim apajjati.
an7.50:8.4: Idampi kho, brahmana, brahmacariyassa khandampi chiddampi sabalampi kammasampi.
an7.50:8.5: Ayam vuccati, brahmana, aparisuddham brahmacariyam carati samyutto methunena samyogena, na parimuccati jatiya jaraya maranena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upayasehi, na parimuccati dukkhasmati vadami.
an7.50:9.1: Yavakivancaham, brahmana, imesam sattannam methunasamyoganam annatarannataramethunasamyogam attani appahinam samanupassim, neva tavaham, brahmana, sadevake loke samarake sabrahmake sassamanabrahmaniya pajaya sadevamanussaya anuttaram sammasambodhim abhisambuddhoti paccannasim.
an7.50:10.1: Yato ca khoham, brahmana, imesam sattannam methunasamyoganam annatarannataramethunasamyogam attani appahinam na samanupassim, athaham, brahmana, sadevake loke samarake sabrahmake sassamanabrahmaniya pajaya sadevamanussaya anuttaram sammasambodhim abhisambuddhoti paccannasim.
an7.50:10.3: akuppa me vimutti, ayamantima jati, natthi dani punabbhavo’”ti.
an7.50:11.1: Evam vutte, janussoni brahmano bhagavantam etadavoca:
an7.50:11.3: upasakam mam bhavam gotamo dharetu ajjatagge panupetam saranam gatan”ti.
